comments:
Build ID: 3.2.2

Steps To Reproduce:
We see the following NPE with key assist when there is no perspective open. When we open a perspective and try key assist it works fine. Now if we close all perspectives and try assist again with no perspectives open, it works fine again. Almost as if it needed something to get initialized.

The line that is causing the problem is 

final IContextService contextService = (IContextService) keyBindingState.getAssociatedWindow().getWorkbench().getAdapter(IContextService.class);

Here getAssociatedWindow() is returning null. the comments for this method say that this hould never be null.

More information:
I cannot reproduce this on 3.3.0. Is this still an issue?
